title: Environment-aware ChainRegistry with testnet configs
description: Add testnet support to EvmIntegration. 1) Promote sepolia-config from demo-ui to main src/registry/configs/sepolia.json. 2) Add isTestnet metadata flag to ChainConfig type. 3) Make ChainRegistry constructor accept NetworkEnvironment parameter and filter configs accordingly (production loads mainnet only, testnet loads testnet only, local loads all). 4) Add environment prefix to CacheManager keys. 5) Create E2E tests using Sepolia with known test addresses.
